title: Apple Channel Store Advisor, Bolzano (mat.cover)
summary: The people at Apple craft wonder that's revolutionized industries. Join Apple to help leave the world better than found. Role known as Apple Staff in Channel (ASC) responsible for crafting extraordinary experiences and building committed Apple customer network.
description: The ASC has responsibilities in four key areas: Customer, In-store Merchandising, Staff Management, and Apple Corporate/Manager.
preferred_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience preferred. Fluent in German.
